official_title: Holmium (Ho: YAG) Laser En Bloc Resection Of Bladder Tumor (HoLERBT) Versus Conventional Transurethral Resection Of Bladder Tumors (cTURBT): A Prospective Randomized Controlled Trial

criteria.raw_text:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients diagnosed at the out-patient cystoscopy with papillary bladder tumour will be legible for inclusion

Exclusion Criteria:

* Tumor criteria

  * Non papillary gross features of the tumor
  * Anteriorly located tumor
* Patients criteria
* Poor performance status
* History of BCG sepsis
* History of bladder irradiation
* Contracted bladder

sex: ALL

stdAges: ['CHILD', 'ADULT', 'OLDER_ADULT']
